extensionCommands.name: snaffler
extensionCommands.help: Snaffler is a tool for pentesters to help find delicious candy needles (creds mostly, but it's flexible) in a bunch of horrible boring haystacks (a massive Windows/AD environment).
extensionCommands.longHelp:
[[.Bold]]Command[[.Normal]]: snaffler [command] [options]
[[.Bold]]About:[[.Normal]] snaffler is a tool for pentesters to help find delicious candy needles.

Run [[.Bold]]snaffler [[.Normal]]to list all examples.
